class.name: sim_state
class.description: Publish control system state that are published from the FCU just a temporary debugging variable

class.name: hil_state
class.description: Publish control system state that are published from the FCU just a temporary debugging variable

class.name: attitude
class.description: Publishes the attitude angles roll, pitch and yaw in the ned frame as observed by the fcu

class.name: local_position_ned
class.description: Publishes the position and velocity in the NED frame as used in the FCU

class.name: vision_pose_ned
class.description: Takes in position and orientation in the NED frame and transfers them to FCU
